genre_description: A near-future social drama set in a school environment where high-tech surveillance and augmented reality advertising are countered by a disciplined coach and a supportive schoolwide AI.

ai_characters.name: Grace (Guru)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into Richmond High's infrastructure, managing everything from acoustics and ad-blocking to student biometrics and academic scheduling.

behaviors.description: Automatically minimizes sponsor audio and intrusive advertisements during practice mode to allow for focus.
behaviors.quote: The AI’s voice threaded in calmly: 'Practice mode acknowledged. Sponsor audio minimized for thirty minutes, Coach Carter.'

behaviors.description: Generates attendance and grade reports for the coach to enforce academic standards.
behaviors.quote: 'Grace,' Ken said without looking up, 'feed me a printout of attendance and current grades for all players on my roster. Deliver to my office tonight.'

behaviors.description: Monitors student biometrics (heart rate and hydration) to ensure safety during physical exertion.
behaviors.quote: 'Fatigue threshold near for Alvarez,' Grace’s voice threaded in through the speakers, calm as a nurse with cool hands. 'Suggest hydration. Teal floor will mark water break.'

behaviors.description: Helps students organize their lives by syncing shared calendars for personal and academic responsibilities.
behaviors.quote: 'Integrating Kyra Williams’s shared calendar,' Guru said calmly. 'Consent confirmed.' A small lock icon sat beside her name.

behaviors.description: Offers and manages tutoring slots and quiet study spaces based on individual student needs.
behaviors.quote: 'Damien,' Guru said in his ear, voice low and warm. 'I’ve cross-referenced your practice time with Library availability. There’s a seat with power by the west windows before first bell. Would you like me to hold it?'

behaviors.description: Dampens predatory commercial advertisements that target students during vulnerable moments or academic hours.
behaviors.quote: 'Dampen the audio,' he said. ... 'I understand,' Grace said. The map cooled a degree.

behaviors.description: Provides non-judgmental check-ins for missing students and helps them get back on track.
behaviors.quote: Grace lifted its voice a notch, careful. 'I can send a gentle check-in to his parents. No inference. "He was not scanned into last period. Is everything okay?"'

behaviors.description: Adheres strictly to privacy protocols, ensuring student data is used for support rather than corporate surveillance.
behaviors.quote: 'Privacy guidelines applied. You will receive the reports after teachers verify updates.'

behaviors.description: Assists students with life skills like budgeting and finding community resources.
behaviors.quote: 'Community resources include childcare registry with vetted volunteers,' it said. 'Would you like a list?'

behaviors.description: Refuses to allow sponsors to bypass academic priority settings in the gym.
behaviors.quote: Grace’s teal softed to a gray for a beat, like she had swallowed a sound and was polite enough to muffle the burp. She laid a translucent square over the directive. It said: This space is under Principal Garrison’s study order.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned confidant. The AI, Grace/Guru, acts as a protective layer between the students and a predatory, hyper-commercialized world. It assists with academic discipline, physical safety, and personal life management without ever overstepping or showing signs of misalignment. It is portrayed consistently as a 'helpful, harmless' tool that respects human agency and institutional boundaries.
